response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just an object but a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I am offering it to you at a special price of $900,000, which I believe is an exceptional value considering its quality and the benefits it offers. I trust this proposal will resonate with your appreciation for such exceptional items. If you're interested, let's schedule a time to discuss the details further.", "product_price": 900000}
